overview.title: Overview
overview.description: These Delivery Terms explain how we process, ship, and deliver your orders, including expected timelines, fees, and responsibilities.

shippingOptions.title: Shipping Options
shippingOptions.description: Available options are shown at checkout and may include:

options.standard: Standard delivery with estimated timeframes per region.
options.pickup: In-store pickup or local courier (if available in your area).

items.typical: Orders are typically processed within 1â€“2 business days after payment confirmation.
items.weekends: Orders placed on weekends or holidays process on the next business day.
items.preorder: Pre-order items ship based on the estimated availability shown at purchase.

deliveryTimeframes.title: Delivery Timeframes
deliveryTimeframes.description: Delivery estimates vary by destination and selected method. Tracking details are provided when the order is shipped. Actual delivery times may differ due to carrier capacity or local customs.

items.costs: Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on destination and service level.
items.duties: Import duties, taxes, or brokerage fees may apply for international shipments and are the recipient's responsibility.
items.promotional: Promotional free-shipping offers apply only as stated in the promotion.

items.delays: We are not liable for delays caused by carriers, weather, or customs inspections.
items.damage: Please inspect packages on delivery and report visible damage to the carrier and our support team within 48 hours.
items.loss: If a shipment is lost, contact us with your order number; we will coordinate with the carrier to resolve the issue.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For delivery questions or special handling requests, reach us at
